https://tmrev.io/movie/309092-Ek Din 24 Ghante 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Set in a hectic world that takes place in 24 Ghante, this film features Rahul Bose, Nandita Das, Kabir Sadanand, Vineet Kumar, Shiv Subramaniam, Shilpa Mehta, Jayant Wadekar and Baby Nidh. Hailed as a groundbreaking Bollywood opus, it takes chances with its structure, plot and storyline to deliver a breakneck drama in a conceptually challenging fashion. Ek Din 24 Ghante
